notes.title: Atomic Habits
notes.content:
Author: James Clear

### Chapter 1
## Atomic Habits - Chapter 1 Summary

- **Introduction to Habits**: Emphasizes the compound growth of tiny improvements. ğŸŒ±
- **The 1% Rule**: Explains how habits that improve by just **1%** can make a significant difference over time. ğŸ”
- **The Story of the British Cycling Team**: Illustrates the power of marginal gains through the transformation of the British Cycling team, which went from mediocrity to winning by focusing on small improvements. ğŸš´
